data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Being anonymous means not to expose distinguishing features that would permit an onlooker, casual as well as intentional, to identify the observed subject or party. As ____ as ____ internet ____ concerned, the ____ of a netizen ____ that ____ person ____ for ____ action ____ throughout ____ infrastructure ____ the ____ can ____ be ____, ____ thus ____ not ____ held ____ for ____ has ____ done. Anonymity differs from encryption in that it obscures a user's identity rather than ciphering the channel of communication, though the latter is often a technical means to achieve the ends of the former.
data.partBlankContent: Being anonymous means not to expose distinguishing features that would permit an onlooker, casual as well as intentional, to identify the observed subject or party. As f__ as t__ internet i_ concerned, the anon_____ of a netizen me___ that t__ person respo______ for a_ action perf_____ throughout t__ infrastructure o_ the n__ can n__ be ident_____, a__ thus c__ not b_ held accou______ for wh__ has be__ done. Anonymity differs from encryption in that it obscures a user's identity rather than ciphering the channel of communication, though the latter is often a technical means to achieve the ends of the former.
data.fullContent: Being anonymous means not to expose distinguishing features that would permit an onlooker, casual as well as intentional, to identify the observed subject or party. As far as the internet is concerned, the anonymity of a netizen means that the person responsible for an action performed throughout the infrastructure of the net can not be identified, and thus can not be held accountable for what has been done. Anonymity differs from encryption in that it obscures a user's identity rather than ciphering the channel of communication, though the latter is often a technical means to achieve the ends of the former.
data.answer: 匿名意味着不暴露那些会让旁观者(无论有意还是无意)识别被观察对象或当事人的显著特征。就互联网而言，网民的匿名意味着对整个网络基础设施中执行的行为负责的人不能被识别，因此不能对已经做的事情负责。匿名与加密的不同之处在于，它掩盖了用户的身份，而不是对通信通道进行加密，尽管后者通常是实现前者目的的技术手段。
